headline: Citigroup Cash-Secured Put Could Lead To Stock Purchase Below Current Price
summary: A cash-secured put on Citigroup could pave the way for investors to purchase the bank's stock below its current price.

raw.headline: Citigroup Cash-Secured Put Could Lead To Stock Purchase Below Current Price
raw.summary: A cash-secured put on Citigroup could pave the way for investors to purchase the bank's stock below its current price.

headline: Citigroup's shareholders approve 2024 pay for CEO, executives, new shares for grants
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -A large majority of Citigroup shareholders has approved CEO's Jane Fraser's 33% pay increase to $34.5 million at a virtual annual meeting held on Tuesday, as well as the compensation for other senior executives.  During the meeting, some shareholders questioned the total size of compensation.  Citigroup's chairman John Dugan said the board had held management "accountable" by reducing the payment of the transformation bonus in 2024 and said the bonus program will not be renewed.
